name: Catopsis
description:
Skeleton in the closet. What are you hiding? This is a SHMUP game with a tower defense twist, where you hide from enemies and/or plant turrets to kill them.

Controls :

  • WASD to move around
  • SPACE to dash 
  • RIGHT- and LEFT-click on mouse to place turrets 

So put on your animal mask and start playing!

A game made by Alice, Claire, Gap, Hanna, Javier and Mira, studying at the game design department of Uppsala Universitet.
